channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Easy Username Updater
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Easy Username Updater

item.title: CVE-2022-2355|2024-08-03T00:32:09.598Z -- unknown -- easy%20username%20updater
item.description: The Easy Username Updater WordPress plugin before 1.0.5 does not implement CSRF checks, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change any user's username includes the admin
